meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Kirstin Cutts Carl Falstrom Jody Jabbora Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7463.

td.p: Kirstin Cutts, a graduate student from Austin, Texas
Carl Falstrom, an immigration attorney from New Orleans, Louisiana
Jody Jabbora, a retired postal clerk from Las Vegas, Nevada (whose 1-day cash winnings total $25,600)

tr.td: IT'S DEBATABLE
THE BOOK OF PROVERBS
HISTORIC AUTOMOBILES
NBA GREATS
ABBREVIATED K
DROPPIN' MAD BEETS

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(I\'m Anderson Cooper.) I was a moderator of several 2016 presidential debates; one of the hot topics at the Kennedy-Nixon debates in 1960 was the global threat of this political ideology')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: If you are familiar with Hawaii\'s state flag, you will know that in one corner of that flag it has the flag of this country whose anthem it used.)
(Alex: [To Kirstin] In the corner of Hawaii\'s state flag is the Union Jack.)
JodyWhat is Aloha Oy?
$3,200
KirstinWhat is God Save the Queen?
$201
CarlWhat is Aloha Oe?
$8,801
\"God Save The Queen\"')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'In her memoirs Queen Liliuokalani tells us that before Hawaii had its own national anthem, it used this one')

tr.td: NATIONAL ANTHEMS
In her memoirs Queen Liliuokalani tells us that before Hawaii had its own national anthem, it used this one
Jody
Carl
Kirstin

3rd place: $1,000
New champion: $11,001

Carl
Kirstin

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
